snippet: The Bronx district attorney’s office said it would investigate activities linked to a prominent rabbi, Jonathan Rosenblatt, who frequently took boys as young as 12 into the sauna naked.
abstract: Bronx prosecutors are asking potential victims to come forward with information about Jonathan Rosenblatt, prominent rabbi of Riverdale Jewish Center who is said to have behaved inappropriately with young boys during long sauna chats in which they were fully naked; statute of limitations may long have past for all but most serious crimes, but district attorney's office still seeks to offer counseling and other services.
lead_paragraph: The Bronx district attorney’s office said it would investigate activities linked to a prominent rabbi, Jonathan Rosenblatt, who frequently took boys as young as 12 into the sauna naked.

headline.main: Bronx Rabbi Case Prompts Prosecutors to Ask People to Come Forward
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Look Into Rabbi’s Sauna Chats
